settings.title: All-Day Comfort
settings.description: Our open-ear design rests gently on your ear, eliminating pressure and discomfort for a weightless experience.

settings.title: 16-Hour+ Battery
settings.description: From your morning commute to your evening workout, Oladance keeps going with an industry-leading battery life.

settings.title: Superior Bass Quality
settings.description: Feel the rich, deep bass. Our patented technology delivers a full-range audio experience unlike any other open-ear headphone.

settings.question: Are these products new or refurbished?
settings.answer: All products sold on Heyup Store are brand new and officially authorized. We partner directly with brands to offer you exclusive deals.

settings.question: What is your shipping policy?
settings.answer: We offer fast and reliable shipping from our local warehouses. Most orders are processed within 24 hours and delivered within 3-5 business days.

settings.question: What if I have an issue with my product?
settings.answer: Your purchase is backed by a full manufacturer's warranty and our dedicated customer support team. We offer hassle-free returns and after-sales service.
